parameters.name: date_suffixes
parameters.label: Date Suffixes
parameters.helpText: Comma-separated list of date suffixes to process (format: YYYY-MM-DD, e.g., 2025-05-15,2025-05-16)

parameters.name: input_bucket
parameters.label: Input GCS Bucket
parameters.helpText: Name of the GCS bucket containing the CSV summaries

parameters.name: gcp_project
parameters.label: GCP Project ID
parameters.helpText: Google Cloud project ID where Bigtable is hosted

parameters.name: app_profile
parameters.label: Bigtable App Profile
parameters.helpText: The Bigtable application profile ID to use (e.g. default)
